synopsis:
Florida, 2011. Framed for a DUI and imprisoned, young Jolyne gains a mysterious new power after receiving a bizarre item from her estranged father.

(Source: Netflix)

Jolyne gets acquainted with Green Dolphin Street Prison with her two-faced cellmate, Gwess, who has obtained Jolyne's locket and a pint-sized new Stand.

(Source: Netflix)

Jolyne acclimates to prison, but a mysterious boy delivers an ominous message before Jolyne receives a visit from her father and an enemy Stand user.

(Source: Netflix)

DIO's follower, Johngalli A. aims for revenge. The boy risks his safety to help Jotaro and Jolyne, but she refuses to leave the kid behind.

(Source: Netflix)

Father and daughter try to escape the visiting room's trap and the prison, but an enemy Stand extracts two discs from Jotaro. One holds Star Platinum.

(Source: Netflix)

Jolyne returns to prison to retrieve Jotaro's discs. Ermes Costello discovers her new ability and a guard with discs in his head before she's attacked.

(Source: Netflix)

After people go missing from the prison's farm, Jolyne and Ermes volunteer to join the search party as a way to look for Pale Snake and the discs.

(Source: Netflix)

Jolyne and Ermes unravel the mystery of F.F. and its user, who admits to helping Pale Snake in his efforts to steal their Stands.

(Source: Netflix)

Pale Snake's user, Father Pucchi, makes his entrance. A baseball game in the yard against Miraschon heats up when F.F.and Stone Ocean get involved.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: Operation Savage Guardian (Head to the Courtyard!) (1)

synopsis:
Assisted by Emporio and his friend Weather Forecast, Jolyne rushes to the courtyard to pass Jotaro's Stand disc to the Speedwagon Foundation.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: Operation Savage Guardian (Head to the Courtyard!) (2)

synopsis:
Father Pucchi learns some damning information. Jolyne and Weather's bodies strain under Jumpin' Jack Spark's ability as the fight continues.

(Source: Netflix)

Jolyne reaches the courtyard. Pucchi recalls his talks with DIO and his reason for hunting Jotaro when Weather unleashes a squall of poison dart frogs.

(Source: Netflix)
